Ammo.name: Ammo
Ammo.fullDesc: This Weapon requires ammunition to make Attacks. You can load a Weapon as part of an Attack made with it.

Concealable.name: Concealable
Concealable.shortDesc: Drawing doesn't provoke, grants ADV on first attack
Concealable.fullDesc: Drawing the Weapon doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks. If you draw the Weapon as part of an Attack, you have ADV on the Attack. You can only gain this benefit once against each creature per Combat.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.fullDesc: You gain +1 PD while wielding the Weapon.

Impact.name: Impact
Impact.fullDesc: You deal +1 damage on Heavy Hits.

Multi-Faceted.name: Multi-Faceted
Multi-Faceted.shortDesc: Weapon has a second Weapon Style
Multi-Faceted.fullDesc: The Weapon gains a second Weapon Style. When you make an Attack with the Weapon, you must choose which Weapon Style to use. The chosen Weapon Style determines the Attack's damage type.

Reach.name: Reach
Reach.fullDesc: This Weapon adds 1 Space to your Melee Range when you Attack with it.

Reload.name: Reload
Reload.shortDesc: +1 damage, must spend 1 AP to reload
Reload.fullDesc: The Weapon's damage increases by 1, but you must spend 1 AP and use a free hand to reload the Weapon. If you make a Ranged Attack with the Weapon using a Reaction, the Weapon must already be loaded to perform the Attack.

Silent.name: Silent
Silent.fullDesc: When you make a Ranged Attack with the Weapon while Hidden, you remain Unheard by creatures you're Hidden from. You must be both Unseen and Unheard to be Hidden. If you become seen while making the Attack, you are no longer Hidden.

Toss.name: Toss (5/10)
Toss.shortDesc: Can throw to make Ranged Attack (5/10)
Toss.fullDesc: You can throw the Weapon to make a Ranged Martial Attack (5/10).

Thrown.name: Thrown (10/20)
Thrown.shortDesc: Can throw to make Ranged Attack (10/20)
Thrown.fullDesc: You can throw the Weapon to make a Ranged Martial Attack (10/20).

Two-Handed.name: Two-Handed
Two-Handed.fullDesc: The Weapon requires 2 hands when you Attack with it.

Unwieldy.name: Unwieldy
Unwieldy.fullDesc: You have DisADV on Attacks made with the Weapon against targets within 1 Space of you. The DisADV from Unwieldy stacks with the DisADV that Ranged Weapons get when they make Attacks against a target that are within 1 Space of you (making it DisADV 2).

Versatile.name: Versatile
Versatile.shortDesc: +2 to Hit when wielded with 2 hands
Versatile.fullDesc: This Weapon can be wielded with 1 or 2 hands. When you wield the Weapon with 2 hands, you gain a +2 bonus to Hit using it.
